member.name: IAdviseSink2.OnLinkSrcChange
member.summary: Notifies the container that registered the advise sink that a link source has changed (either name or location), enabling the container to update the link's moniker.
member.param: A pointer to the interface identifying the source of a linked object.

member.name: IAdviseSink2
member.summary: The IAdviseSink2 interface is an extension of the interface, adding the method to the contract to handle a change in the moniker of a linked object. This avoids overloading the implementation to handle the renaming of both embedded objects and linked objects. In applications where different blocks of code might execute depending on which of these two similar events has occurred, using the same method for both events complicates testing and debugging.
